items.label: Wikipedia
items.description: Theme resembling the one often used in Wikipedia to for sky charts.

items.label: Dev
items.description: "Development" phase theme. Uses highly contrasted and often incompatible colors in order to make rendered items more visible.

items.label: Sky chart
items.description: Theme defined closely to standard black and white sky charts, like the ones seen in printed catalogues.

items.label: Night view
items.description: Dim and low contrast theme preserving the eyes from agressive light, that might be useful at night.

items.label: Tiny
items.description: Does not accentuate objects, helper lines and labels are low contrasted. Just a calm an pleasant view of the sky.
